info.title: Learn Mina Blockchain API
info.description: The Learn Mina Blockchain API, accessible at https://api.learnmina.com, offers key functionalities for querying the Mina blockchain, including account balances, transaction details, and block information.

get.description: Retrieve current balance of given account.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier.

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.description: Set the mina address public key. Allowed is only a string that starts with 'B62' followed by a sequence of base58 characters, with no specified maximum length.'

get.description: Retrieve transactions which was sended by given address

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier.

parameters.name: senderAddress
parameters.description: Set the mina address public key. Allowed is only a string that starts with 'B62' followed by a sequence of base58 characters, with no specified maximum length.'

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set a limit on how many results will be shown. Allowed is only a number up to two digits long, which can be any value from 0 to 99.'

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Set the sorting type between ascending and descending. Allowed is only the specific text 'BLOCKHEIGHT_DESC' or 'BLOCKHEIGHT_ASC', representing sorting directions for block height.'

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier.

parameters.name: receiverAddress
parameters.description: Set the mina address public key. Allowed is only a string that starts with 'B62' followed by a sequence of base58 characters, with no specified maximum length.'

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set a limit on how many results will be shown. Allowed is only a number up to two digits long, which can be any value from 0 to 99.'

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Set the sorting type between ascending and descending. Allowed is only the specific text 'BLOCKHEIGHT_DESC' or 'BLOCKHEIGHT_ASC', representing sorting directions for block height.'

get.description: Retrieve transactions which took place between 2 given addresses

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier.

parameters.name: senderAddress
parameters.description: Set the mina address public key. Allowed is only a string that starts with 'B62' followed by a sequence of base58 characters, with no specified maximum length.'

parameters.name: receiverAddress
parameters.description: Set the mina address public key. Allowed is only a string that starts with 'B62' followed by a sequence of base58 characters, with no specified maximum length.'

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set a limit on how many results will be shown. Allowed is only a number up to two digits long, which can be any value from 0 to 99.'

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Set the sorting type between ascending and descending. Allowed is only the specific text 'BLOCKHEIGHT_DESC' or 'BLOCKHEIGHT_ASC', representing sorting directions for block height.'

get.description: Retrieve transaction data using a given transaction hash.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Set the transaction hash string. Allowed is only a string consisting of 52 alphanumeric characters, including both letters and numbers.'

get.description: Retrieve the most recent block height from the selected blockchain.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier.

parameters.name: blockHeight_lt
parameters.description: Set the highest block height. Allowed is only a non-negative integer up to 9 digits long, not starting with any zeros unless it is the number zero itself.'

get.description: Retrieve the most recent block height from the selected blockchain.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set a limit on how many results will be shown. Allowed is only a number up to two digits long, which can be any value from 0 to 99.'

get.description: Retrieve transaction which memoHash has not a certain value, can be useful to find not empty memo fields.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier.

parameters.name: memoHash
parameters.description: Expects an encoded base58 string. Allowed are only strings that start with "E4" followed by exactly 51 characters from the base58 set, which excludes the numbers 0, and the letters O, I, and l.'

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set a limit on how many results will be shown. Allowed is only a number up to two digits long, which can be any value from 0 to 99.'

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Set the sorting type between ascending and descending. Allowed is only the specific text 'BLOCKHEIGHT_DESC' or 'BLOCKHEIGHT_ASC', representing sorting directions for block height.'

get.description: Retreive the event which is attached to an transaction

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Set the transaction hash string. Allowed is only a string consisting of 52 alphanumeric characters, including both letters and numbers.'

get.description: Retrieve the latest events from a Mina contract.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier.

parameters.name: creator
parameters.description: Set the creator's address as the minimum address. Allowed is only a string that starts with 'B62' followed by a sequence of base58 characters, with no specified maximum length.'

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set a limit on how many results will be shown. Allowed is only a number up to two digits long, which can be any value from 0 to 99.'

parameters.name: blockHeight_lt
parameters.description: highest block Allowed is only a non-negative integer up to 9 digits long, not starting with any zeros unless it is the number zero itself.'
